paks.name: Pak Store
paks.description: A Pak Store in this economy?! Find, install and update community made Paks right on your device!
paks.author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.0.0: Upgraded the UI to use gabagool, my NextUI Pak UI Library!
changelog.v1.0.2: Added a message when device is not connected to Wi-Fi.
changelog.v1.0.3: Make sure Pak Store exits when updating itself.
changelog.v1.0.4: Just keeping dependencies up to date. I make enough technical debt myself... don't need to add to it.
changelog.v1.0.5: Small fix in UI library for artifacts that appeared when no bg.png is present. And actually quit Pak Store when it updates itself.
changelog.v1.1.0: Prepping Pak Store for bundling with NextUI!
changelog.v1.2.0: Added the ability to see info about installed paks and support for pakz archives.
changelog.v1.2.1: Bugfix for a small error when handling pakz archives.
changelog.v1.3.0: Bugfix for blank entries in Installed Paks list when a previously installed Pak was pulled from the store.
changelog.v1.5.0: Removed the extra button press after a download completes and added an 'Update All' option for you scoundrels.
changelog.v1.5.1: Made a boo boo! Introduced a bug when I added the 'update all' functionality causing Pak Store to crash when viewing a single update. Thanks to @Helaas for reporting this!
changelog.v2.0.1: Added support for tracking a Pak's previous name to prevent blank entries in the Installed Paks list. DB also tracks Repo URL, something I should have done from the start.

paks.name: Grout
paks.description: A RomM client for NextUI and muOS
paks.author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.2.0: Platform mapping tweaks, multi-file ROM downloads, bug fixes and more!
changelog.v1.2.1: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.2: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.3: Background art downloads moved to the foreground due to inadvertent early termination.
changelog.v1.2.4: Correct check for the muOS info folder to determine the proper mnt path to use.

paks.name: Game Manager
paks.description: A one-stop pak for all your game management needs.
paks.author: K-Wall & redria7

changelog.v2.0.0: Huge UI refresh along with long requested bugfixes.
changelog.v2.0.1: Small fix in UI library for artifacts that appeared when no bg.png is present.
changelog.v2.1.0: Enhanced archiving features courtesy of redria7!
changelog.v2.2.0: Nice little update for y'all. Added art images to the games list, added a global action menu for downloading all missing art and now art can be found for nested folders. Also three bugfixes; bulk adding games to collections should be more reliable, redria7 added a robust system for keeping track of the last selected list item and toastd figured out why art could not be found for some games.
changelog.v2.2.2: Archiving / Unarchiving Multi Disk and BIN/CUE games now works as intended. Nested folders now work with the Global Actions Missing Art tool. Shoved Global Actions into a Tool Menu for future Pak expansion.
changelog.v2.3.0: Enhanced art searching that uses a fallback Jaccard Similarity with configurable threshold when art with an exact filename match does not exist.
changelog.v2.4.1: Added clear recently played to the global actions tool. Thanks madeleineostoja for the suggestion!
changelog.v2.5.0: Added a new Play History tool allowing for viewing of all current game tracking history. Includes total hours, hours by console, hours by game, ROM location tagging, ROM collection tagging, a play summary screen, and a granular detail screen. Play summary and granular detail screens can also be accessed from game actions.
changelog.v2.6.0: Behind the scenes collection enhancements, fix for the art downloader missing exact name matches, you can now jump pages (D-Pad Left / Right) while reordering games in a collection and new option in the collection options screen to alphabetize the games.
changelog.v2.7.0: A new filtering option for the Play History Tool!
changelog.v2.7.1: Updated filter screen formatting to show the full time.
changelog.v2.8.0: Updated the system tag mappings to help find game art for more platforms.

paks.name: RetroArch
paks.description: A clean, reproducible RetroArch build with known provenance.
paks.author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.0.0: Initial release with RetroArch v1.21.0. See GitHub README for more details.

paks.name: Aesthetics
paks.description: Download, Apply, Clear, and Save Aesthetic Properties: Theme Management with Ultimate Control!
paks.author: redria7

changelog.v1.0.0: Aesthetics launch, featuring theme downloads, theme deletion, and wallpaper/icon management
changelog.v1.0.1: Collection Icon setting support added and reduced (PORTS) png collection (for now)
changelog.v1.1.0: Bulk Theme Management: Apply, Save, Clear, and Rename entire themes at once!

paks.name: LED Manager
paks.description: A enhanced LED configuration tool.
paks.author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.0.0: The initial release! Warning there may be bugs!
changelog.v1.1.0: Added a "Kid Mode" environment variable to be uncommented in launch.sh
changelog.v1.1.1: Potential fix for ambient mode not working as reported by @machlen.

paks.author: IncognitoMan

changelog.4.0.89: Added backlight settings and bluetooth media controls, updated keymap and many 'small' fixes.
changelog.4.0.92: Updated keylock method, updated keymap to allow media keys while device is locked.

paks.description: A MinUI pak for browsing your saved screenshots. Automatically organized by game/app.

changelog.v0.1.2: Initial launch for the Pak Store
changelog.v0.2.0: Pressing X while viewing a screenshot will prompt to delete. (I'm working on speeding up the screenshot list rebuild speed)
changelog.v0.2.2: Sped up rebuilding screenshot list after deleting a screenshot.
changelog.v0.2.3: Moved screenshot delete to list of screenshots.
changelog.v0.2.4: Displays a status screen while rebuilding cache.
changelog.v0.2.5: Fixed bug with games with an apostrophe in their title and sped up pak loading by only loading list of screenshots on launch, and then building individual games' screenshots when choosing that game.

paks.name: WiliWili
paks.description: wiliwili has a B-station browsing experience that is very close to the official PC client.
paks.author: xfangfang & dragonflylee

paks.name: SMSU
paks.description: Genesis-Plus-GX (PUNCHiUM) core with MD-MSU support for Trimui Brick NextUI.
paks.author: SkyZ0ro

changelog.v1.1.0: Renamed GMD.pak to SMSU.pak, updated ROM folder name and README, added QR code.
changelog.v1.1.1: Fixed pak.json name: removed .pak extension as requested by GitHub feedback.

paks.name: SDLReader
paks.description: Read PDF, CBZ/ZIP & CBR/RAR comic archives, EPUB, MOBI, and plain text files with smooth navigation, zoom, rotation, and mirroring. SDLReader is a lightweight, cross-platform viewer optimized for the TrimUI Brick and TrimUI Smart Pro (TG5040) running NextUI, built on SDL2 and MuPDF.
paks.author: Helaas

changelog.v1.0.0: Initial release with PDF, CBZ, and EPUB support, optimized for TrimUI Brick
changelog.v1.0.1: Better scrolling, support for MOBI files [MuPDF 0.50 -> 1.26.7], and faster performance by streamlining the code.
changelog.v1.0.2: Fixed zoom/pan lag and high-zoom slowdowns with better prerendering, caching, and rendering limits.
changelog.v1.0.3: Adds support for CBR (RAR) comic book archives
changelog.v1.1.0: Support for WebP images in CBZ/CBR archives and EPUB/MOBI files, improving compatibility with modern comics and e-books.
changelog.v2.0.0: Major rework with ImGui UI overlay, controller-ready file browser, runtime font & theme picker, reading history, and expanded TG5040 bundle tooling.
changelog.v2.0.1: UI improvements with smart text contrast, continuous D-pad scrolling in file browser, and edge progress bar can now be disabled.
changelog.v2.1.0: Settings persist after app updates, configurable document minimap, thumbnails in file browser (X button), smoother high-zoom rendering, improved controller-friendly menus, and more robust TG5040 power handling.
changelog.v2.1.1: Prevent the thumbnail viewer from crashing when handling large folders.
changelog.v2.1.2: Enable reading RAR5 archives and add full TrimUI Smart Pro support.
changelog.v2.1.3: File browser letter-jump navigation (L1 + R1) and add support for tapping left & right to scroll a full page in list view.
changelog.v2.1.4: Smarter rotation/fit views, on-screen page/zoom overlays. Optionally keep pan position when changing page.
changelog.v2.2.0: TXT file support & toolchain moved to loveretro/tg5040-toolchain
